name: Falcon 3.0
description:
Falcon 3.0 is a simulation game developed by Spectrum Holobyte. It was originally released in 1991. It was published by Sphere.
You can play Falcon 3.0 on PC.
It was produced by Michael Mancuso. Scot Bayless directed the game. It was scored by Paul Mogg, Paul Mogg (SNES) and Peter Ward (Wii.
